00030 class PolynomialKernel
00031 {
00032  public:
00040   PolynomialKernel(const double degree = 2.0, const double offset = 0.0) :
00041       degree(degree),
00042       offset(offset)
00043   { }
00044 
00054   template<typename VecType>
00055   double Evaluate(const VecType& a, const VecType& b) const
00056   {
00057     return pow((arma::dot(a, b) + offset), degree);
00058   }
00059 
00061   const double& Degree() const { return degree; }
00063   double& Degree() { return degree; }
00064 
00066   const double& Offset() const { return offset; }
00068   double& Offset() { return offset; }

00072   {
00073     std::ostringstream convert;
00074     convert << "PolynomialKernel [" << this << "]" << std::endl;
00075     convert << "  Degree: " << degree << std::endl;
00076     convert << "  Offset: " << offset << std::endl;
00077     return convert.str();
00078   }
00079
